sentences.sContent: The book aims to cover all aspects of city life.
sentences.sCn: 这本书旨在涵盖城市生活的各个方面。

sentences.sContent: Events began to take on a more sinister aspect.
sentences.sCn: 事情开始呈现较为不祥的征兆。

remMethod.val: a(表加强) ＋ spect(看) → 仔细看一个东西的外表 → 外表

trans.tranOther: one part of a situation, idea, plan etc that has many parts
